name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Rising of the Shield Hero Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Rising of the Shield Hero Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD The Rising of the Shield Hero background. Theme for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Enjoy a new The Rising of the Shield Hero wallpaper with every new tab.
2. Randomize The Rising of the Shield Hero backgrounds or mark your favorites from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Built-in search bar powered by Google.
4. Instant access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. Jot down tasks with the New Note feature.
7. Convenient access to your most visited websites.
8. Quickly reach your bookmarks.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for fast access.
10. One-click access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes with a single click.
12. Effortlessly share to social media.
13. Easily download wallpapers.
14. Direct access to play games.
15. Activate fun animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on your The Rising of the Shield Hero new tab.
